Uses of Interface
com.complexible.stardog.api.Exporter

  • Packages that use Exporter 
    Package Description
    com.complexible.stardog.api
    Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS.

    • Uses of Exporter in com.complexible.stardog.api

      Methods in com.complexible.stardog.api that return Exporter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Exporter Exporter.context(Collection<org.openrdf.model.URI> theNamedGraphs)
      Specify which contexts should be exported.
      Exporter Exporter.context(org.openrdf.model.URI theNG, org.openrdf.model.URI... theOtherNamedGraphs)
      Specify which contexts should be exported.
      Exporter Connection.export()
      Create an Exporter to export RDF from the database
      Exporter Exporter.format(org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
      Specify the RDF format the export should use.
      Exporter Exporter.obfuscated(File theObfuscationConfig)
      Export the RDF using the specified obfuscation configuration, or DEFAULT_OBFUSCATION to use the default configuration.
